channel.title: Music – 캐롤 키드(Carol Kidd)
channel.description: Recent content in 캐롤 키드(Carol Kidd) on Music

item.title: 캐롤 키드(Carol Kidd) - When I Dream
item.description:
I could build a mansion that is higher than the trees
I could have all the gifts I want and never ask please
I could fly to Paris it’s at my beck and call
Why do I live my life alone with nothing at all

But when I dream
I dream of you
Maybe someday you will come true
When I dream of you
Maybe someday you will come true

I can be the singer or the clown in any role
I can call up someone to take me to the moon
I can put my makeup on and drive the man insane
I can go the bed alone and never know his name

But when I dream
I dream of you
Maybe someday you will dream come true
When I dream I dream of you
Maybe someday you will come true
